block_comment: This block is a synchronous reset logic for the 'rst_auxout' signal. It listens for changes on the positive edge of 'auxout_clk' or 'rst' signals. If a reset 'rst' is detected, 'rst_auxout' is set high immediately, performing a system reset. Otherwise, in normal operation, 'rst_auxout' mirrors the value of 'rst_auxout_rr' in synchronization with the 'auxout_clk' clock signal.
